answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Latisha, 
The City of Elko, NV requires the host of the special event to fill out the following form to register vendors for the event: www.ci.elko.nv.us/.../Event%20Vendor%20Permit%20Private%20Property.pdf
Albuquerque has special event vendor permits that need to be filled out by the vendors: http://www.cabq.gov/envhealth/specialevents.html
In Tuscon, AZ, vendor permits are given out quarterly through the department of Parks and Recreation, which does a lottery for it. Vendors need a health permit and a business license to get a permit. http://cms3.tucsonaz.gov/parksandrec/permits.php#P69_8068
I hope this helps!

author: Latisha Thomas
text:
During special events, does your jurisdiction require temporary/transient vendors involved in the event to  individually apply for a special event vending permit or do they fall under the sponsor/host's special event permit?
Also, does your jurisdiction have designated locations for transient and push cart vendors to sell their merchandise?
title: Special Events & Vendors
